A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved Star Wars as a kid (whatever the first 3 are now called) and I've seen all the rest since then because of my kids. Some of it is passable entertainment and some of it not (the jar jar binks one for example). This was just terrible. It was too loud to sleep through and unbearably long and boring. I'm just dumbfounded that anyone other than a child could find this entertaining.
